Name: Dungeon King
About the game: Long ago, the King gave up his Shadow. He hid it and threw the Key out of sight, plunging into an eternity of dreams. While the King slept, the Kingdom fell into ruin. The Dungeons, which previously faithfully served the King, were filled with vile creatures. And the dreams become nightmares. Dungeon King is a turn-based adventure puzzle. Player should smash all enemies on tile based map avoiding traps and plan his moves ahead. Key features: Bright and juicy cartoon graphics 5 locations 5 treasure monsters 25 dungeons with many rooms inside Turn-based puzzles with growing difficulty Monsters and traps with different behaviors Mystery story featuring King's Shadow and secret boss room
